    • Constructor Detail

      • RichTextWidget

        public RichTextWidget(org.eclipse.jface.resource.ResourceManager rscMgr,
                      org.eclipse.swt.widgets.Composite parent,
                      int style)
        Constructs a rich text widget. By default, rich text is expanded and text is set to blank.
        Parameters:
        rscMgr - the resource manager used to manage the resources (fonts, colors, images, cursors...)
        parent - the parent composite
        style - the style

      • RichTextWidget

        public RichTextWidget(org.eclipse.jface.resource.ResourceManager rscMgr,
                      org.eclipse.swt.widgets.Composite parent,
                      int style,
                      String labelText,
                      boolean expanded)
        Constructs a rich text widget.
        Parameters:
        rscMgr - the resource manager used to manage the resources (fonts, colors, images, cursors...)
        parent - the parent composite
        style - the style
        labelText - the label text
        expanded - set the richtext content by default expanded or collpased

      • RichTextWidget

        public RichTextWidget(org.eclipse.jface.resource.ResourceManager rscMgr,
                      org.eclipse.swt.widgets.Composite parent,
                      int style,
                      String labelText,
                      boolean expanded,
                      boolean editable)
        Constructs a rich text widget.
        Parameters:
        rscMgr - the resource manager used to manage the resources (fonts, colors, images, cursors...)
        parent - the parent composite
        style - the style
        labelText - the label text
        expanded - set the richtext content by default expanded or collapsed
        editable - is editable?
